Lefort is proud to announce the successful commissioning of a first Lidex 1300T at the Taiwanese company, Feng Hsin Steel. 

Proof of the growing interest in Lefort machines from steelmakers, this installation also demonstrates the productivity and robustness necessary for companies wishing to process all kinds of scrap metal at high efficiency. 

A great project smoothly conducted by our teams and our local partners. Congratulations!

A new LEFORT Koloss 1000 TS has joined the ranks at Dalton Metal Recycling

A new Koloss, for a brand new yard for the Dalton Group in Central/Western Glasgow. This yard is brand new and designed to give the best layout for Metal Recycling. The electrically powered (4x110kW) giant of a shear is now in place and ready to further enhance the processing capability of the Dalton Group. The machine is extremely quick, due to the 4 large electric motors and three valve blocks, making it a very strong and productive machine ğŸ’ªğŸ½

â€”

âš™ï¸ 1000T cutting force, Ts box (wraparound), 180T baling ram, 4 x 110 kW electric motors, 8.0m box length, lid force each lid 400T, hold down 200T, loading hopper, window crosshead, platform & cabin, automatic greasing.
Lindborgs bildemontering ab ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ªğŸ’ªğŸ½

ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ Jebb Metals have now put to work their new Koloss 1000 TS. This Lefort shear/baler is proving to be a real head turner as it sits proudly at the top of their yard. 

ğŸ’¥ Delivered to site in three main pieces the machine is assembled on a foundation frame and commissioned within two weeks. The machine is very productive on all grades of ferrous and non-ferrous metals, shearing with the 1000T window crosshead or baling with the 180T baling ram. 

ğŸ’ªğŸ½ The power, strength and speed of its cutting is giving very pleasing results for its new owners. This machine, fitted with the 600HP Scania diesel engine, operators control cabin and tunnel pusher ram is easily capable of 25-30 Tonnes per hour of production, depending upon material and cut length. 

We wish Philip & Stephen all the best for the future with their new Lefort Koloss 1000 TS ğŸ™Œ

Equipped with a high-performance 550 hp engine and a 7m box, the Trax 1250 delivers an impressive cutting force of 1,250 tons (1,375 us tons). Thanks to its crawler tracks, the machine moves effortlessly across sites, offering unmatched flexibility for both on-site operations and recycling facilities.
 
But the true game-changer lies in its integrated loading table/hopper. This innovative configuration significantly boosts productivity by allowing continuous feeding of the shear and reducing material handling. During the compression/shearing cycle, the operator can already prepare the next batch by loading the hopper â€“ eliminating idle time.

Read more : https://www.lefort.com/en/lefort-unveils-its-new-trax-1250-with-integrated-loading-table/

The completely redesigned LefortÂ® power unit -available on the medium range-, has a better accessibility and most maintenance can be performed from the ground. The hoods are even better soundproofed and protect the technical components from wear. The result of more than 2 years of engineering and 78 years of field experience! #safetyfirst

Discover the new Lefort TRAX 1250 with loading hopper, in action !
